#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
 
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define getcx getchar
#define putcx putchar
#else
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
#define putcx putchar_unlocked
#endif
#define mod 1000000007
inline ll scan() {
    register ll n=0;
    register ll c = getcx();
    int sign = 1;
    while(c < '0' || c > '9') {
        if(c == '-') sign=-1;
        c = getcx();
    }
    while(c >= '0' && c <= '9') {
        n = (n << 3) + (n << 1) + c - '0';
        c = getcx();
    }
    n = n * sign;
    return n;
}
inline void inps(char *str){
    register char c;
    register ll i = 0;
    while((c = getcx()) == '\n' || c == ' '){}
    while(c != '\n' && (int)c != EOF){
        str[i++] = c;
        c = getcx();
    }
    str[i] = '\0';
}

ll ar[100009];
ll sri[100009][500];

int main() {
	// your code goes here
 // ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  //cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);
	
   register	ll i,j,n,u,a,b;
	
	const ll fix=450;
	n=scan();
	u=scan();
	for(i=0;i<u;i++)
	{
	a=scan();
	b=scan();
	if(a>=fix)
	{
	    for(j=b;j<=n;j+=a)
	    ar[j]++;
	}
	else
	{
	    sri[b][a]++;
	}
	}
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
	    for(j=1;j<fix;j++)
	    {
	        ar[i]+=sri[i][j];
	        if(i+j<=n)
	        {
	            sri[i+j][j]+=sri[i][j];
	        }
	    }
	    printf("%lld ",ar[i]);
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
